name: The Legend of Zelda and the Lampshade of No Real Significance
name_original: The Legend of Zelda and the Lampshade of No Real Significance
description:
Disclaimer: I do NOT own the rights to this game! Please play the original game by Super Flash Bros. on NewGrounds!

This is a remake of a Zelda fan game that I, and many others, really enjoyed. I wanted to give it some love, so I remade it using assets and tiles from the GameBoy Zelda games (namely Oracle of Ages/Seasons).  Here's hoping I did the original classic 'Lampshade of No Real Significance' justice!

Click here to play the original: ﻿Zelda: Lampshade (newgrounds.com)
